contentrichtext.text: '''Dark Knight''' may refer to: {{TOC Right}} ==Batman comics== * [[Dark Knight (nickname)]], a nickname for the superhero Batman * ''[[Batman: The Dark Knight]]'', an ongoing comic book series written by David Finch, started in 2011 * ''[[The Dark Knight Returns]]'' or ''Batman: The Dark Knight'', a 1986 miniseries by Frank Miller ==Other Batman media== * [[The Dark Knight (film)|''The Dark Knight'' (film)]], a 2008 film by Christopher Nolan ** [[The Dark Knight trilogy]] ** [[The Dark Knight (soundtrack)|''The Dark Knight'' (soundtrack)]], the soundtrack album to the 2008 film ** [[The Dark Knight (video game)|''The Dark Knight'' (video game)]], a cancelled video game based on the 2008 film * ''[[Batman: DarKnight]]'', an undeveloped Batman film proposed in 1998 ==Batman amusement park rides== * [[The Dark Knight Coaster]], a roller coaster at several Six Flags parks * [[Batman: The Dark Knight (roller coaster)]], a roller coaster at Six Flags New England ==Other uses== * [[Dark Knight (TV series)|''Dark Knight'' (TV series)]] or ''Fantasy Quest'', a medieval adventure TV series featuring Todd Rippon * Dark Knight, a [[Final Fantasy character classes#Dark Knight|character class in ''Final Fantasy'']] == See also == * ''[[Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight]]'', a monthly comic book series from 1989 to 2007 *{{intitle|Dark Knight}} * [[Dark Night (disambiguation)]] * [[Black Knight (disambiguation)]] * [[Darkest Knight]] {{disambiguation}}
